topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c0753263687229ab421e00#post_54c0753263687229ab421e00
The thing about legalizing gay marriage as opposed to feminism, is that gay marriage advocates advocate a piece of freedom that benefits everyone in a win win situation, instead of trying to take it away from a particular group to further their political agendas.
